item.description:
I am thinking about gaming - serious gaming... Saturday looked like a good enough day so I figured - let's set something up!  As per my usual hang out - the MUB will be open till... 1:00 AM!  Plenty of time to get lots of things in since I am trying for a 4:00pm start time.

 

http://unhmub.com/

 

I will be bringing a few things, and if you are interested in something specific, let me know here so I can plan to bring it!  We will start at 4:00pm and go till whenever there is no longer a demand to play games... if that is even possible!

 

Parking will be available in C lot and B lot.  Go to www.unh.edu for a campus map if you need information.  Hope to see you there!
item.name: "I don't have a clever name for this event" event
